metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14806 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Pallets Werkzeug before 0.15.3, when used with Docker, has insufficient debugger PIN randomness because Docker containers share the same machine id.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-werkzeug - 0.14.1+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
python3-werkzeug - 0.14.1+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-werkzeug package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.14.1+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1').
